price: 复活时降临之日，犯罪的人发誓说：他们只逗留了一霎时，他们原是这样悖谬的。
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَانُواْ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yuq'simu al-muj'rimūna mā labithū ghayra sāʿatin kadhālika kānū yu'fakūna
